page.title: 09BECKINGHAM (LINCOLNSHIRE)
page.content: Approximately 80 households. 190 people on the electoral roll (+68 children ). Approximately 25% retired people, remainder fairly well spread across the age range from young families to pre-retirement age group. Among the older people many are Beckingham born or have lived in Beckingham a long time. Three-quarters of the population have moved into the village during the last 15 years ___ again across the age range. In about 30% of the families both the husband and wife work outside the village which leads to most families having at least one car and probably as many as 35% of the households having more than one car. Public transport is a limited bus service at times which do not encourage its use.
